title: Sound On: Texas Abortion Law Reaction
itunes:title: Sound On: Texas Abortion Law Reaction
description:
Guests: Massachusetts Congresswoman Lori Trahan, Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter Greg Stohr, and Bloomberg Politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.
